tns:patch.keyword: Update User Id and Confirm new Password field to set the Id to be all capitalized to show in the cpForm
tns:patch.author: timothymugo

script.lang: UPDATE dg_message SET message_utf8='User ID' WHERE lang_iso='en' AND message_key='-147193456'; UPDATE dg_message SET message_utf8='Confirm New Password' WHERE lang_iso='en' AND message_key='1257743995';
